mapper.select: SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(createTime/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') as date, SUM(quantity) as orderSum FROM order_item oi LEFT JOIN order_orders oo ON oi.orderCode = oo.code WHERE (TO_DAYS(CURDATE()) - TO_DAYS(FROM_UNIXTIME(createTime/1000,'%Y-%m-%d'))) < ${num} GROUP BY TO_DAYS(FROM_UNIXTIME(createTime/1000,'%Y-%m-%d'))
